In this page you will find the course plan, general topics of discussion associated with each lecture as well as links to corresponding materials. The first seven class meetings (on zoom) are scheduled to be from 6pm to 9pm (GMT+7), every other day from 19/8/2024 (Mon) to 04/09/2024 (Wed), except weekends and holidays. The last meeting on Wednesday 13/11/2024 will be dedicated to a revision of the topics covered, exam preparation and Q&As.
